channel.title: [Link] Random notes on improving the Redis LRU algorithm
channel.description:
I would like to recommend the following article by antirez (the author of Redis) for reading:
[Random notes on improving the Redis LRU algorithm](http://antirez.com/news/109)
<del>As a side note - perhaps we could create a new tag/section for sharing links?</del>
